item.description:
Let's meet for a quick early lunch in the Financial District, then head over to the Aquarium!

Lunch is at Foumami, an "Asian Sandwich Bar", which serves "bings" with Korean, Chinese and Japanese influences. They also serve soups, salads, snacks, specialty drinks (alliteration not mine) with nothing over $8.

Then let's head over to the Aquarium (~10min walk). I would like to try to make the 1:15pm Giant Ocean Tank divers or 1:50pm penguin presentation!

I have a pass that admits 4 (not including children under 3, who are free), so please claim a spot in the comments. Otherwise admission is (gulp) $22.95/adult, $15.95/child.

If we/the kids feel up to it and it's a nice day, we can go for a walk on the Rose Kennedy Greenway or visit the Christopher Columbus Waterfront Park.
item.name: Yummy Lunch then Aquarium Fun!
